thread.title_full: IIT Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Research Associate Posts

author: publisher12
title: IIT Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Research Associate Posts

organizations.name: modelling of soft matter complex fluids

text: IIT Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Research Associate Posts IIT Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Research Associate Posts: Department of Biotechnology, Industrial Research & Development Unit, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Delhi has published notification for the recruitment of Research Associate vacancies for the project titled “Centre of Excellence for Bio-pharmaceutical Technology (RP03126)” on contract basis. Eligible candidates may walk in on 11-04-2017 at 03:30 p.m. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below…. IIT Delhi Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Research Associate Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Ph.D with first class or equivalent at the preceding degree in the appropriate discipline and Ph.D thesis should be in one or more of Molecular Simulations and/ or Modelling of Soft Matter Complex Fluids, Modelling/ Simulation of Protein Aggregation areas with experience in Coding in C/ C++/ Fortran. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on test/ interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may walk in test/ interview with application in prescribed format giving complete information regarding educational qualifications indicating percentage of marks of each examination passed, details of work experience and a recent passport size photograph along with original certificates (both academic & professional) on 11-04-2017 at 03:30 p.m. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 11-04-2017 at 03:30 p.m. Venue: Room No. 381, (Library) Block-II, Department of Chemical Engineering, IIT DELHI, Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110 016. For more details like fellowship, experience, duration & other information click on the link given below….
